author: Nahlee
title: I loved this place and you will too!
text:
Walking to the hotel, located within the Hutongs, we weren't sure what we were going to find. It took us what felt like ages to walk down these narrow streets, but we were pleasantly surprised. If you're looking for a more authentic chinese experience, this is a brilliant place to stay. You're located within normal Beijing life, the people that lived in the area are very chinese, and it was great seeing how they lived and worked. It's close to the station, and it's very easy to access all the top touristy places. The staff are very friendly, and whilst their english isn't strong and will always go up and beyond to help. The rooms are quite spacious and for the most part clean. The breakfast was excellent and just what we needed for the busy days we planned.
